<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3366</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">School Blog Bar Lev Junior High</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schule Blog Stablev-Juniorhöhe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Haute Junior de Lev de Barre de Blog 
D'École</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Elevação Júnior Do Lev Da Barra De Blog Da 
Escola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">High Minore Del Lev Della Barra Di Blog Della 
Scuola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νεώτερος LEV ράβδων σχολικού Blog υψηλός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Colmo Menor Del Lev De la Barra De Blog De la 
Escuela</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a blog where schools share their cultures by means of collaborations with different cultures</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">culture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">blog</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">communication</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein blog, in dem Schulen ihre Kulturen
mittels der collaborations mit unterschiedlichen Kulturen teilen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un blog où les écoles partagent leurs 
cultures au moyen de collaborations avec différentes cultures</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um blog onde as escolas compartilhem de 
suas culturas por meio dos collaborations com as culturas diferentes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un blog in cui le scuole ripartiscono le 
loro colture per mezzo di collaborations con differenti colture</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα blog όπου τα σχολεία μοιράζονται 
τους πολιτισμούς τους με τη βοήθεια των συνεργασιών με τους 
διαφορετικούς πολιτισμούς</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es un blog donde las escuelas comparten sus 
culturas por medio de collaborations con diversas culturas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kultur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">blog</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kommunikation</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">culture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
